articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Suryakumar Yadav’s injury update after horrible ankle twist gives India scare - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav has provided an injury update after India thrashed South Africa by 106 runs in the 3rd T20I to level the series 1-1 on Thursday. | Cricket
articles.content: Suryakumar Yadav stayed away from the field for a major chunk of the South African innings during the 3rd T20I after twisting his ankle while fielding. The India skipper hurt his ankle in the third o… [+2285 chars]
